title: Food at Jiggers
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Raw, Beer/Wine, Take-out, British, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A fully licensed restaurant with a view overlooking Derwentwater, queen of the lakes. Open for breakfast and evening meals. Uses locally sourced produce in dishes. Vegans please inquire. All food is made-in-house. Please see board for seasonal opening hours. Dogs welcome.
streetAddress: Castlerigg Hall Caravan and Camping Park, Castlerigg
